00574   //  =================  Title  =======================
00575 
00576   DefineClass(Title);
00577   DefineStreamFunctions(Title);
00578 
00579   class Title : public io::Stream  {
00580 
00581     friend class Model;
00582     friend class Chain;
00583     friend class Root;
00584 
00585     public :
00586 
00587       Title ();
00588       Title ( io::RPStream Object );
00589       ~Title();
00590 
00591       void  FreeMemory ( bool keepBiomolecules );
00592 
00593       // Fills the PDB file header
00594       void  SetHeader ( cpstr Classification, // any length is Ok
00595                         cpstr DepDate,    // DD-MMM-YYYY
00596                         cpstr ID_Code );  // not more than 11 chars
00597 
00598       // Interprets the ASCII PDB line belonging to the title section
00599       // and fills the corresponding fields.
00600       //   Returns zero if the line was converted, otherwise returns a
00601       // non-negative value of Error_XXXX.
00602       //   PDBString must be not shorter than 81 characters.
00603       ERROR_CODE ConvertPDBString ( pstr PDBString );
00604 
00605       // MakePDBString() makes the ASCII PDB HEADER line from the
00606       // class data. PDBString must be not shorter than 81 characters.
00607       void  MakePDBHeaderString ( pstr PDBString );
00608 
00609       // GetStructureTitle() returns the contents of TITLE record
00610       // unfolded into single line. If Title is missing, returns
00611       // contents of COMPND(:MOLECULE). If COMPND is missing, returns
00612       // HEADER. If Header is missing, returns PDB code. If no PDB
00613       // code is there, returns "Not available".
00614       pstr  GetStructureTitle ( pstr & S );
00615 
00616       PTitleContainer GetObsData () { return &obsData;  }
00617       PTitleContainer GetCaveat  () { return &caveat;   }
00618       PTitleContainer GetCompound() { return &compound; }
00619       PTitleContainer GetSource  () { return &source;   }
00620       PKeyWords       GetKeyWords() { return &keyWords; }
00621       PTitleContainer GetExpData () { return &expData;  }
00622       PTitleContainer GetMdlType () { return &mdlType;  }
00623       PTitleContainer GetRemarks () { return &remark;   }
00624       PTitleContainer GetJournal () { return &journal;  }
00625 
00626       realtype GetResolution(); // -1.0 mean no resolution record in file
00627 
00628       int   ParseBiomolecules(); // returns the number of biomolecules,
00629                                  // -2 for general format error
00630                                  // -3 for errors in BIOMT records
00631 
00632       int   GetNofBiomolecules();
00633       void  GetBiomolecules   ( PPBiomolecule & BM, int & nBMs );
00634       PBiomolecule GetBiomolecule ( int bmNo ); // bmno=0,1,..
00635                                  // returns NULL if bmNo is incorrect
00636 
00637       void  PDBASCIIDump ( io::RFile      f   );
00638       void  MakeCIF      ( mmcif::PData CIF );
00639 
00640       //   GetCIF(..) returns the same code as ConvertPDBString(..)
00641       // save for Error_WrongSection
00642       ERROR_CODE  GetCIF ( mmcif::PData CIF );
00643 
00644       inline pstr  GetIDCode() { return idCode; }
00645       inline bool  GetCol73 () { return col73;  }
00646       void  TrimInput ( pstr PDBString );
00647 
00648       void  Copy  ( PTitle TS );  // if TS is NULL, then empties
00649                                        // the class
00650 
00651       void  write ( io::RFile f );    // writes header to PDB binary file
00652       void  read  ( io::RFile f );    // reads header from PDB binary file
00653 
00654     protected :
00655 
00656       //   Header data
00657       pstr     classification;  // classification of the molecule
00658       Date     depDate;         // deposition date DD-MMM-YYYY
00659       IDCode   idCode;          // unique PDB identifier
00660       realtype resolution;      // resolution
00661       bool     col73;           // True if columns 73-80 contain PDB ID
00662 
00663       TitleContainer obsData;     // obsoletion data
00664       TitleContainer title;       // title data
00665       TitleContainer caveat;      // error data
00666       TitleContainer compound;    // compound data
00667       TitleContainer source;      // source
00668       KeyWords       keyWords;    // key words
00669       TitleContainer expData;     // experimental data
00670       TitleContainer mdlType;     // model desctiptions
00671       TitleContainer author;      // author data
00672       TitleContainer revData;     // revision data
00673       TitleContainer supersede;   // supersede records
00674       TitleContainer journal;     // journal records
00675       TitleContainer remark;      // remark records
00676 
00677       PPBiomolecule  biomolecule;
00678       int            nBiomolecules;
00679 
00680       void  Init();
00681       void  FreeBiomolecules();
00682 
00683       PBiomolecule addBiomolecule();
00684 
00685   };

00690                              // 'abin.title'
